001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.base;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterAll;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.TestInstance;
006import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
007import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
008import org.springframework.test.annotation.DirtiesContext;
009
010/**
011 * Base test class for sequential test execution.
012 *
013 * <p>This class extends {@code BaseQuest} and ensures that tests run sequentially
014 * within a single instance using the {@code PER_CLASS} lifecycle.
015 * It also provides before-all and after-all lifecycle hooks for test setup and cleanup.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019@Component
020@TestInstance(TestInstance.Lifecycle.PER_CLASS)
021@DirtiesContext(classMode = DirtiesContext.ClassMode.AFTER_CLASS)
022public class BaseQuestSequential extends BaseQuest {
023
024   /**
025    * The test service container for managing test-related dependencies.
026    */
027   private Services services;
028
029   @Autowired
030   public void setServices(Services services) {
031      this.services = services;
032   }
033
034   /**
035    * Executes the setup logic before all test methods in the class.
036    */
037   @BeforeAll
038   protected final void beforeAll() {
039      beforeAll(services);
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Hook method for pre-test setup logic.
044    *
045    * @param services The test service container.
046    */
047   protected void beforeAll(Services services) {
048      //empty method for beforeAll to override if needed
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Executes the cleanup logic after all test methods in the class.
053    */
054   @AfterAll
055   protected final void afterAll() {
056      afterAll(services);
057   }
058
059   /**
060    * Hook method for post-test cleanup logic.
061    *
062    * @param services The test service container.
063    */
064   protected void afterAll(Services services) {
065      //empty method for beforeAll to override if needed
066   }
067
068}
